sage.scene.shape

Class Cube

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.shape.Cube

  • public class Cube
extends Leaf
    Cube defines a Leaf representing a cube made up of a list of vertices, a list of faces (each of which is a list of four indices into the vertex list), and a list of face colors corresponding in order to the faces in the face list. The Cube can be drawn by fetching each element of the faces and using each of the four indices in the face element to access the corresponding vertex (each of which has three components, [X, Y, Z].
    Author:
    John Clevenger

      Cube(java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a cube with the specified name, centered at the origin and with vertices at +/- 1 in each of the X, Y, and Z directions.

    • Method Detail

      • getFaces

        public int[][] getFaces()
        Returns an array of arrays of ints defining the faces of this Cube. Each element of the first dimension references an array containing four ints specifying the vertex indices of one face of the Cube.
        Returns:
        an array of face descriptions, each of which is an array of ints referencing the four vertices making up the face.

      • getVertex

        public float[] getVertex(int index)
        Returns an array of floats containing the [X,Y,Z] values of the Cube vertex specified by index.
        Parameters:
        index - - the number of the desired Cube vertex; must be 0 <= index <= 7.
        Returns:
        the X,Y,Z values of the specified Cube vertex

      • getFaceColor

        public java.awt.Color getFaceColor(int face)
        Returns the color of the specified Cube face.
        Parameters:
        face - - the face whose color should be returned; must be 0 <= face <= 5.
        Returns:
        the color of the specified Cube face.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int degrees)
        Concatenates a rotation of degrees about the axis [1,1,1] onto the local rotation transform of this Cube.
        Parameters:
        degrees - - the amount of rotation to be applied to the Cube's local rotation transform.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int degrees,
                   graphicslib3D.Vector3D axis)
        Concatenates a rotation of degrees about the specified axis onto the local rotation of this Cube.
        Parameters:

        axis - - the axis about which the rotation takes place
